gw.cc.financials.recovery.entity

Interface RecoveryReserveSet

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TransactionSet

    public interface RecoveryReserveSet
extends TransactionSet
    RecoveryReserveSet Group of recovery reserves.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • prepareForCommit

        ApprovalResult prepareForCommit()
                         throws com.guidewire.cc.system.exception.RecoveryReservesNotAllowedException
        This method must be called on a new RecoveryReserveSet before the database commit occurs. Calls Presetup Rules on the RecoveryReserveSet, then submits it for approval. Also, ensures that each transaction in the RecoveryReserveSet has an associated ReserveLine.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the RecoveryReserveSet has a transaction whose status is not valid for the action being performed.
        com.guidewire.cc.system.exception.RecoveryReservesNotAllowedException - if the system is not configured to allow recovery reserves, i.e., the 'UseRecoveryReserves' parameter is false.

      • newRecoveryReserve

        RecoveryReserve newRecoveryReserve(Exposure exposure,
                                   CostType costType,
                                   CostCategory costCategory,
                                   RecoveryCategory recoveryCategory,
                                   Currency reservingCurrency)
        Creates a new RecoveryReserve with a status of draft, adds it to this RecoveryReserveSet and returns it. The ReserveLine of this new RecoveryReserve is specified by the provided Exposure, CostType, CostCategory and ReservingCurrency. A NULL Exposure indicates that this is a claim-level RecoveryReserve. Also, the Transaction Currency of the new RecoveryReserve will be set to the same as Reserving Currency (or Claim Currency, if Reserving Currency is null).
        Parameters:
        exposure - The Exposure of this new RecoveryReserve - can be NULL, in which case this will be a claim-level Transaction
        costType - The CostType of this new RecoveryReserve - cannot be NULL.
        costCategory - the CostCategory of this new RecoveryReserve - cannot be NULL.
        recoveryCategory - the RecoveryCategory of this new RecoveryReserve - cannot be NULL.
        reservingCurrency - The Reserving Currency of this new RecoveryReserve - can be NULL (defaults to Claim Currency).
        Returns:
        the new RecoveryReserve.
